game.name: Mario Kart 8
game.desc: Mario Kart 8 is the 8th installment of the Mario Kart series, for the Wii U console.nnnnThe gameplay includes thirty-two circuits (sixteen brand new ones and sixteen retro ones) on which the characters race riding a variety of vehicles like the returning motorcycles from Mario Kart Wii or the karts, which can be customized.
